channel.title: Rideshare Market on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Rideshare Market on FinanClub

item.title: LYFT
item.description: score:34 Chances: LYFT is set to thrive in the growing rideshare market, buoyed by competitive pricing and cost-cutting measures. With the economy on a recovery trek, the smaller competitor could ride coattails. Risks: The company’s liquidity position raises major concerns. However, should broader conditions become squeezed, the ridesharing industry could become commoditized.
